docs.abstract: When a secretive private equity firm bought Remington, sales were strong and the future bright. A decade later, the company couldn’t escape its debts.

docs.abstract: In most textbooks, slavery is only a dot on a timeline. About 92 percent of students don’t know that it was the central cause of the Civil War, a survey found.

headline.main: Why Can’t We Teach Slavery Right in American Schools?
